document.full_text: top-ranked rafael nadal, the defending champion, won his record-tying sixth french open singles title by defeating third-seeded roger federer 7-5, 7-6 (3), 5-7, 6-1.
document.title: rafael nadal defeats roger federer in french open
lines_and_colors: top-ranked rafael nadal, the defending champion, won his record-tying sixth french open singles title by defeating third-seeded roger federer 7-5, 7-6 (3), 5-7, 6-1.
